    public class KafkaReporter
extends MetricReportReporter
    Kafka reporter for Codahale metrics.

      • forRegistry

        @Deprecated
public static KafkaReporter.Builder<? extends KafkaReporter.Builder> forRegistry(MetricRegistry registry)
        Deprecated. This method is bugged. Use KafkaReporter.Factory.forRegistry(com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry).
        Returns a new KafkaReporter.Builder for KafkaReporter. If the registry is of type MetricContext tags will NOT be inherited. To inherit tags, use forContext method.
        Parameters:
        registry - the registry to report
        Returns:
        KafkaReporter builder

      • forContext

        @Deprecated
public static KafkaReporter.Builder<?> forContext(MetricContext context)
        Deprecated. This method is bugged. Use KafkaReporter.Factory.forContext(gobblin.metrics.MetricContext).
        Returns a new KafkaReporter.Builder for KafkaReporter. Will automatically add all Context tags to the reporter.
        Parameters:
        context - the MetricContext to report
        Returns:
        KafkaReporter builder
